frequency.label: Interval between currency gains
frequency.tooltip: This will give users currency at the specified interval.

quantity.label: Currency gain
quantity.tooltip: How many points the users will earn at each interval.

only_subs.label: Only subs will gain currency
only_subs.tooltip: If turned on, only subs will gain currency at each interval.

gain_offline.label: Gain currency while offline
gain_offline.tooltip: If turned on, users on the channel will gain currency while the stream is offline.
